divs: Sighting DetailsBrightly glowing orbs in sky around cellphone towers, will appear and are large in comparison to tower from my home approx 10 miles away. Will vanish in a second after getting much brighter. Reappears miles away and mimics the same behavior. Almost nightly appearances. There was one night that an Orb had given birth to another and absorbed the 2nd back in, I have only witnessed this occurance once with my son. There are 11 cellphone towers visable from my back door (and I have terrible reception) I am on a slight hill and have great view of everything around me. I have tried to view these objects thru a telescope and binoculers or take a piture and for some reason they are not visable thru these devices. I have nothing but frustration for these things...but total fascination at the same time.
Summary: Brightly glowing orbs in sky around cellphone tower..will appear and are large in comparison to tower from my home. Will vanish in a second after getting brighter. reappears miles away and mimics the same behavior. Almost nightly appearances.
